title: Ramit Sethi - How To Talk To Anybody (Compressed Version)
description:
Trying to talk to people can be so stressful - how do we know what to say? 
We think we have so much to offer, that if people just "got us" they'd LOVE us...but when we try to have a conversation, we put our foot in our mouth. 


Ramit My name is Ramit Sethi and I'm the author behind I Will Teach You To Be Rich. Over the years, I've noticed that you can have the best technical skills in the world - but if you don't learn to communicate with the people around you, it doesn't matter. 
After years of figuring out what separates the social "naturals" from everyone else, I finally cracked the code. Now, I want to show you how you can talk to anyone, anywhere, anytime (even if you've always been socially awkward). 
"How do I stop being so awkward?" 
Today, I invite you to see the exact strategies, methods, and tactics you can use to improve your social skills IMMEDIATELY. Here's just some of what I'll share with you: How to make conversations fun and engaging, using social experiments the "naturals" have been using for years 
A simple framework to ensure you'll never run out of things to say again 
How to entertain a group of people effortlessly (while overcoming challenges like interruptions, distractions, and large audiences) 
What restaurant desserts can teach you about social skills 
And much
